name: Campaign Monitor
desc: Campaign Monitor makes it easy to attract new subscribers, send them beautiful email newsletters and see stunning reports on the results.

values.ViewReports: Access to basic reporting data from any campaigns you've sent.
values.ManageLists: Can access all your subscriber and list data.
values.ImportSubscribers: Can add/import subscribers into your account.
values.SendCampaigns: Can send campaigns to your subscribers.
values.ViewSubscribersInReports: Can access campaign reports down to the individual subscriber level.
values.ManageTemplates: Can add, remove or update email templates.
values.AdministerPersons: Can add/edit account administrators and access billing information.
values.AdministerAccount: Can add/edit account administrators and access billing information.
